entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
